sentences.sContent: Oddly enough, that is precisely what I intend.
sentences.sContent_eng: Oddly enough, that is precisely what I intend.
sentences.sCn: 说也奇怪， 那正是我的打算。

sentences.sContent: They intend to be an army of light against the onslaught of darkness.
sentences.sContent_eng: They intend to be an army of light against the onslaught of darkness.
sentences.sCn: 他们打算成为一支光明之师对抗黑暗军团的猛烈进攻。

sentences.sContent: In this and all of our efforts, we intend to work smarter, not lower our standards or quality of service.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this and all of our efforts, we intend to work smarter, not lower our standards or quality of service.
sentences.sCn: 通过我们这些努力，我们想要更聪明地开展工作，而并不降低我们的标准或服务的质量。

phrases.pCn: 希望有或接到；打算成为……

words.tran: 故意的，有意的；打算中的
